Instruccion: Match the symbols to the words

opciones: Johnny can play the guitar really well, but he can't dance!

Instruccion: Match the pictures with the words and the instructions.

opciones: Lie with your face towards the floor and push with your hands to raise your body until your arms are straight.
Grip the bar and slowly pull yourself until your chin clears the bar
Get into push-ups position. Then bend your elbows 90 degrees and rest your weight on your forearms
Start with your feet shoulder-width apart. Step forward with one leg. Lower your hips and bend your knees at 90-degree angles. Slowly stand up and repeat with your other leg.

respuestas: It's a beautiful town near the Rockies, with a great University.

opciones: Who has been to New York?
Where has Bill gone as an exchange student?
How does Bill describe San Francisco?
respuestas: It's a great city, full of beautiful things.

opciones: If you touch the oven when it's on,
If the fire drill goes off,
respuestas: we walk out to the patio quickly.

Instruccion: Match the causes to the possible effects to make sentences.

opciones: When you see big dark clouds in the sky,
respuestas: it's probably going to rain soon.

opciones: When the teacher says, "take out a piece of paper",
respuestas: there's going to be a test.

opciones: When my Dad says he wants to talk,
respuestas: I know that I'm in trouble.

opciones: When Beth looks at me up and down,
respuestas: I know she's jealous of my clothes.

opciones: If you feel jealous of your friend,
respuestas: open up and tell her nicely.
sit down, keep quiet and listen.

Instruccion: Match the British words to the American words.
Match the clauses to complete the sentences.

opciones: If I'm stuck in my homework,
respuestas: a true friend will help me finish it.
talk to someone about your feelings.
life seems better and more colorful.

opciones: Don't ask me to lie for you,
respuestas: if you are a really good friend.

opciones: If you are my good friend,
respuestas: you won't make me feel less.
